channel.title: Biking on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Biking on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: There once was a teacher from school, Who went biking one day for a fool. He was brave, though quite clumsy, On the road he did grumble, …
A detective was biking ‘round town, To hunt for clues and look around, Inspecting each street, He would not miss a beat, Solving the case …
An interpreter, a curious soul, Set off on a biking tour. The journey was tough, But she was never bluff, On the pedals she gave it her all. …
